description:
Section 73 Application for the Variation of Conditions 2 (drawing and document numbers) of Section 73 application Ref: P2023/3579/S73 dated 12-February-2024, which granted permission for: Variation of Condition 2 (Drawing and Document Numbers) of Planning Permission Ref. P2023/2159/FUL dated 19/09/2023 which sought permission for 'Proposed amalgamation of 15 & 17 Compton Avenue to create a single residential unit, plus glazed rooftop addition, a first floor extension, additional rooflights including openable rooflight over main courtyard, refurbishment of the front elevation and associated landscaping and alterations'. 

The proposed variation of Condition 2 seeks to: Include an acoustic enclosure around the ASHP, Add a fixed ladder and fall arrest system to rear elevation and Add a green / sedum roof (build-up below 150mm) to rear flat roof.
status: Called in by Secretary of State
decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 19/09/2026.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 19/09/2023 LBI ref: P2023/2159/FUL. Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
